messages.subject: Valerie's coming! OT
messages.msgSnippet: We are set for being there next year, but I would really love to be there on November 8th. If you could either post it here, or e-mail me privatly with the
messages.messageBody:
"We are set for being there next year, but I would really love to be
there on November 8th. If you could either post it here, or e-mail
me privatly with the info, when it is announced, I would appreciate
it."

If anyone wants to visit us in Pensacola during Valerie's visit and
talk, please log onto our email list. If you go to
pensacolaunschoolers.com and scroll down, you'll see a yahoogroups
link. OR, you could search at yahoogroups.com for
pensacolaunschoolers and sign on there.
That's the best way to stay informed on events here. If you just
want to know about Valerie's visit, you could just be "no mail" and
check in to read only the posts that are related to that.

You might even be able to find someone to put you up for the night!
We've got 45 members at the list now, although some aren't here in
town.

Ren
